title: Aum gaNapathi
sahitya:
Om gaNapati Om gaNapati Om sarasvatiyE sharaNam 



anupallavi



pUm bhuviyilum pugazhaip-pADi pUshanai sheyya Ashi taruvIr



caraNam



akara ukara makara Om ena anbarivaruL kUDi amara gangai aruvi pOl

shuddhAnandam koNDADi

shikhara jyOti nAdamAga ihapara sukha bOdhamAga shirandu viLanga

mELArNavam varam tandennai vAzha vaippIr
